reasoning: Systemic-onset JIA (also called systemic JIA) represents 10-20% of JIA cases. Estimated global incidence ~0.18 per 100k children annually based on Scandinavian and North American pediatric rheumatology registry data, though global coverage limited.
source: Petty RE et al. (2004). International League of Associations for Rheumatology classification of juvenile idiopathic arthritis: second revision. J Rheumatol. 31(2):390-392
